Warranty

*SwissMicros* FIVE (5) YEARS Limited Warranty


WHAT IS COVERED BY THIS WARRANTY?


*SwissMicros* warrants the *SwissMicros* branded hardware product and
accessories against defects in materials and workmanship when used
normally for a period of FIVE (5) YEARS from the date of original retail
purchase by the end-user purchaser ("Warranty Period"). If you sell your
*SwissMicros* branded hardware product or give it as a gift, the
warranty is automatically transferred to the new owner and remains in
effect for the original FIVE (5) YEARS Limited Warranty period.


WHAT IS NOT COVERED BY THIS WARRANTY?


This warranty does not apply:

  * to cosmetic damage, including but not limited to scratches, dents
    and broken plastic on ports
  * to damage caused by use with another product
  * to damage caused by accident, abuse, misuse, liquid contact, fire,
    earthquake or other external cause
  * to defects caused by normal wear and tear or otherwise due to the
    normal aging of the *SwissMicros* Product


If during the Warranty Period you submit a valid claim to *SwissMicros*
will, at its option repair or replace the *SwissMicros* Product

http://www.swissmicros.com/ <http://www.swissmicros.com>
